name: Data-Commons
body:
###Data Commons Community.
Data commons community is a group of individuals and volunteers.Our goal is to provide a rich data library in Big Data world. We are currently impressed by Apache Spark and want to build tools around it.
### Products
A set of libraries which are designed for data cleaning, quality checks and providing useful insights to data.
Our core project prep-buddy which a library for cleaning, transforming and executing other preparation tasks for large datasets on Apache Spark.

### Support or Contact
Catch up with us at our google group data-commons-toolchain@googlegroups.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
